clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: This drug is indicated in adults in combination with other antiemetics for the prevention of delayed nausea and vomiting associated with emetogenic chemotherapy

contraindications.disease: Most common adverse reactions occurring in 3 of patients receiving moderately emetogenic chemotherapy and combinations of anthracycline and cyclophosphamide included decreased appetite neutropenia dizziness dyspepsia urinary tract infection stomatitis and anemia Most common adverse reactions occurring in patients receiving cisplatin based highly emetogenic chemotherapy included neutropenia hiccups and abdominal pain
